verses.roman:
vāsā-ghara pūrvavat sabāre deoyāilā
mahāprasāda-bhojane sabāre bolāilā

synonyms: vāsā-ghara—residential quarters; pūrva-vat—as previously; sabāre—unto all of them; deoyāilā—caused to be given; mahā-prasāda—the remnants of food from Jagannātha; bhojane—to eat; sabāre—unto everyone; bolāilā—He called.
translation: The Lord again arranged for the residential quarters of all the devotees and thereafter called them to partake of the remnants of food offered to Lord Jagannātha.
